about_the_game:
Deal of the Dead: Final Cut is a Solitaire-style, survival horror, card game.

Fight your way through a zombie-infested city in search of rescue. Wield a variety of single-use melee weapons and reloadable ranged weapons to take down the undead. Increase your chances of survival by rescuing other survivors and searching for first aid kits and other usable items along the way. Each deck is randomized and reshuffled as you progress through different locations to ensure a unique play though every time.

Salvation awaits...

CAMPAIGN




A short tutorial and campaign introduce the gameplay features with a simple narrative and progressive difficulty level. Additional gameplay modes and challenges are unlocked upon the completion of the campaign.

FREEPLAY




Completing the Campaign unlocks Freeplay mode (and additional content). Freeplay mode allows you to fully customize your gameplay experience with settings to input your name and adjust your avatar, difficulty level, number of locations, number of bosses, special weapons, and game background, etc.

FEATURES


  • Accessible turn-based gameplay
  • Unique hand drawn art style
  • Short Campaign with 13 stages
  • Unlockable Challenge mode with additional 13 stages
  • Unlockable Freeplay mode to fully customize your game
  • Unlockable art gallery
  • Fast gameplay loop (under 5 minutes per deck)
  • More than 200 card variations

content_descriptors.notes: Blood splatter and weapon damage effects are shown whenever survivor or enemy cards are attacked.
